dmca.title: [EV1-C1542098M] Fwd: copyright/personal rights violation - DMCA notice

To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 3:50 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1542098M] Fwd: copyright/personal rights violation - DMCA notice Subject: [EV1-C1542098M] Fwd: copyright/personal rights violation - DMCA notice ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Service Provider, This page on one of your servers: http://www.fetishgossip.com/portal/index.php? is knownly and willingly serving a voice recording that was recorded of me without my permission - this is illegal and unethical. Please consider this your DMCA notice as this voice recording is considered copyrighted material under the DMCA. this file is www.fetishgossip.com/fg.swf please remove this unauthorized recording immediately and put your client on notice as i suspect he will just repost it. thanks you, Sabrina Nicole Goedderz ------------- 207.44.128.0 - 207.44.255.255 Everyones Internet 390 Benmar Suite 200 Houston, TX US Williams, Randy admin@ev1.net +1-713-579-2850 MIME element (text/html)
